title: Brute Force Attack
description: A Brute Force attack is a trial-and-error method used by attackers to guess valid credentials...
recommendation: 1. Rate Limiting: Implement per-IP and per-account request limits...

title: Weak Ciphers Enabled
description: The server supports outdated or weak cryptographic ciphers (e.g., RC4, DES)...
impact: Confidentiality Loss – Attackers may decrypt sensitive traffic...
recommendation: Disable weak ciphers – Remove RC4, DES, 3DES...

title: Missing Security Headers
description: The application does not implement one or more recommended HTTP security headers...
impact: Increased Attack Surface – Lack of headers such as CSP...
